title: About Airflow Korean User Group
subtitle: A Korean developer community centered around Apache Airflow technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Build a healthy community ecosystem where Korean developers using Apache Airflow can share experiences and knowledge and grow together.
items: Mutual learning through sharing practical experiences
Contributing to the development of the Apache Airflow ecosystem

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Become the most active and influential Apache Airflow community in Asia and contribute to the global open source ecosystem.
items: Participating and presenting at international conferences

meetup.title: Regular Meetups & Workshops
meetup.description: We regularly host offline/online meetups monthly to share Airflow-related practical experiences and technical insights. We provide an interactive platform where both speakers and attendees can learn and grow.
meetup.stats: We have held {{count}}+ meetups so far

study.title: Study Groups
study.description: We operate small study groups on various topics to provide opportunities for in-depth learning. From beginners to advanced users, everyone can participate in learning groups that match their level.

opensource.title: Open Source Contribution
opensource.description: We support Korean contributors to the Apache Airflow project and spread the culture of open source contribution. We encourage various forms of contribution including code contribution, documentation, translation, and testing.
opensource.stats: {{count}}+ Koreans have contributed to Apache Airflow

cooperation.title: Cooperation
cooperation.description: Cooperative relationships where we help each other and grow together

learning.title: Learning
learning.description: Culture of continuous learning and knowledge sharing

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Pursuing new ideas and technical challenges

openness.title: Openness
openness.description: An open community where anyone can participate
